revised_title: The Efficacy of Oil of Olives in Treating Viper Bites
tldr: Stephen Williams shares his observations and experiments on the effectiveness of oil of olives in treating viper bites. He recounts a case where William Oliver was bitten by a viper and experienced severe symptoms. After applying oil of olives, Oliver's pain subsided, and his symptoms gradually disappeared. Williams also conducted experiments on animals, demonstrating the efficacy of the treatment.
